howItWorks.title: Issue Certificates in Minutes
howItWorks.subtitle: The most intuitive credential platform. No training needed — just design, send, and track.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Choose from professional templates or upload your own. Add your brand colors, logo, and signature in minutes.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Send individually or in bulk via CSV. Recipients are notified instantly — no accounts required.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Credentials land in a branded digital wallet. One-click sharing to LinkedIn, email, or any platform.

features.title: Everything You Need to Scale
features.subtitle: A complete platform for issuing, managing, and verifying digital credentials
features.blockchainDesc: Every credential is independently verifiable with a unique QR code. Recipients and employers can validate instantly.
features.brandingDesc: White-label the entire experience. Your logo, colors, and domain on every certificate and wallet.
features.bulkDesc: Issue thousands of certificates at once via CSV upload. Save hours with automated workflows.
features.apiDesc: RESTful API with webhooks. Connect with your LMS, Zapier, and 3,000+ apps seamlessly.
features.analyticsDesc: Track views, shares, and verifications in real-time. Understand engagement and optimize your programs.
features.multilangDesc: Issue certificates in any language. Reach global audiences with full Unicode and RTL support.
